DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine different meal pattern influence absorption beneficial plant pigment ( carotenoid ) vegetable . The hypothesis carotenoid absorption lower daily vegetable consume one meal compare two small meal throughout day .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Meal Patterning Carotenoid Absorption From Vegetables
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age range : 1850 year Body mass index ( BMI : weight ( kg ) /height ( m2 ) ) range 2029 kg/m² Weight stable ( < 4.5 kg change within last 3 month ) Constant habitual activity pattern , exceed activity recreational level past 3 month Have clinically normal blood profile ( specifically normal liver kidney function fast blood glucose ≤110 mg/dl ) Nonsmoking Nondiabetic No current use medication affect lipid profile No intestinal disorder include lipid malabsorption , lactose intolerance No heavy consumption alcohol ( > 2 drink per day ) No current use dietary supplement affect cholesterol , ( e.g . Benocol fiber supplement ) willingness discontinue use study Exclusion criterion : Diabetic Use lipid altering medication
